title: WTB: t207 Moriarty and Works vg/ex
author: rainier2004

posts.post_title: WTB: t207 Moriarty and Works vg/ex
posts.post_content: Looking for these 2 for a Tigers team set.  Looking for these guys in vg/ex raw or graded.  No incommon back preferred.  Thanks for the interest.

With these two, you'll only find them with "uncommon" backs.  They're available with Broadleaf, Cycle, and the Anon backs.  They're also not often found in grades above VG.   

Moriarty is probably easier on any given day, FWIW.

Best of luck!
--
Mike
